page.title: 02QUEENZIEBURN GALA DAY
page.content:
The first Saturday in June is always the GALA day. The procession starts at 12.30 in Anderson Cresent.
First of all came the pipe band. Then came the queen and her entourage followed by decorated lorries and children in fancy dress. The queen's jeep was decorated with red and white crepe paper.It had paper flowers around the edge where the queen gets into the jeep.They were sitting on red velvet covered seats. The parade was escorted around the village by the police who stopped the traffic on the way to the school grounds where the crowning ceremony takes place.
